main event: A resident observed a gray smoke-shaped object in graceful flight that disappeared fully, noted during various times on August 29-31, 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as having no lights and making no noise during the observation,The duration of the sighting was approximately 45 seconds,The object's speed was noted as slow and steady with a slight downward angle,Sketches were sent along with the report but no photographs were included,The object was estimated to be about 12 to 15 feet in diameter.
